frontmatter.title: The Best Badminton Podcasts (2020)
frontmatter.description: The trend for podcasts has been growing year on year without any signs of slowing down. People can listen to the news, educational content and discussions around almost any industry or hobby. They’re free and accessible to anyone with a smartphone or computer. So what are the best Badminton podcasts out there?
